name: FapTitans Dark
description:
Got annoyed at the theme of the website and the small screen, so i made this.
I am aware that the background picture is a little buggy due to the sizing, may fix it in the future.

If you want something else changed, just spam me, i check my stiles quite often.
additional_info:
Patch #1: Made Dark Tower playable.
Patch #2: Fixed some problems that i was bothered to fix and made it also work on faptitans.com. It actually works better on faptitans.com
